(1) Supervision - Opportunity to be responsible for the work of others
(2) Precision Work - Perform work that requires careful attention to detail
(3) UI Work - Enjoy creating screens, layouts, and the like
(4) Investigation - Solving complex questions, trouble-shooting and problem-solving as a core part of job
(5) Mental Challenge - Engage continually with complex algorithms, backend-development
(6) Work Alone - Do projects by myself, without any amount of contact with others.
(7) Collaboration - Have close working relations with group; work as a team to achieve common goals
(8) Competition - Engage in activities which pit my abilities against others.
(9) Public Recognition - Get public credit and positive feedback for work well done
(10) Team Recognition - Recognition of the team (and not the individual) through group outings, parties, etc
(11) Quiet Recognition - Shown appreciation without public announcement: a simple thank-you, a gift-card, etc
(12) Financial Recognition - Shown appreciation with money and money alone
(13) Work Under Pressure - Work in circumstances where there is little or no margin for error, or with demanding personal relationships
(14) Time Freedom - Have responsibilities that I can work at according to my time schedule; no specific working hours required.
(15) Change and Variety - Work responsibilities that frequently change.
(16) Intellectual Status - Be regarded as very well-informed and a strong theorist, acknowledged as an "expert"
(17) Moral Fulfillment - Feel that my work is contributing to ideals I feel are very important
(18) Mtg Format - When documents and whiteboards are not needed (and the weather permits), I prefer walking mtgs to sitting in a room
(19) Blogging/Presenting - I enjoy documenting and/or presenting on technical topics
(20) Education/Training - Spending my days learning new technologies
